suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useCallback has a missing dependency: 'setTtftMs'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [personaId, scenarioId, runtimeFeatures.spsEnabled, setTtftMs, firstDeltaRef, updateEncounterStateRef]

suppressions.justification: setTtftMs is a stable state setter

suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'composeEncounter', 'resetAllTrackingState', 'setTtftMs', and 'updateEncounterStateRef'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [personaId, scenarioId, runtimeFeatures.spsEnabled, setTtftMs, resetAllTrackingState, updateEncounterStateRef, composeEncounter]

fix.text: [personaId, scenarioId, runtimeFeatures.spsEnabled, setTtftMs, resetAllTrackingState, updateEncounterStateRef, composeEncounter]

suppressions.justification: State setters and callbacks are stable; isComposing removed to prevent trigger loop

suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'metrics' and 'onMetrics'. Either include them or remove the dependency array. If 'onMetrics' changes too often, find the parent component that defines it and wrap that definition in useCallback.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [metrics, onMetrics]
